Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 425,000 SF of Class A Lab/Office Space Available in 2023

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 17,891 SF one story flex building available for sale at 55 Deer Park Drive in East Longmeadow, Massachusetts. This building is situated in the highly desired Deer Park Industrial Center. This building is minutes from shops, restaurants, gyms, and other amenities. It can be used as a single tenant space or easily offered as a multi-tenant building.
